sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import '../styles/PropertyListings.css'; import { FiMapPin, FiHome, FiLayers, FiDroplet, FiClock, FiChevronLeft, FiChevronRight } from 'react-icons/fi'; const PropertyListings = () => { const containerRef = useRef(null); const scroll = (direction) => { const { current } = containerRef; if (current) { const scrollAmount = 400; current.scrollBy({ left: direction === 'left' ? -scrollAmount : scrollAmount, behavior: 'smooth' }); } }; const properties = [ { id: 1, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1564013799919-ab600027ffc6', price: 'CHF 2,300,000', beds: 4, baths: 3, sqft: 2800, status: 'Available', address: 'Zermatt, Switzerland', daysOnMarket: 5 }, { id: 2, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1512917774080-9991f1c4c750', price: 'CHF 1,950,000', beds: 3, baths: 2, sqft: 2200, status: 'Available', address: 'St. Moritz, Switzerland', daysOnMarket: 2 }, { id: 3, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1493809842364-78817add7ffb', price: 'CHF 2,700,000', beds: 5, baths: 4, sqft: 3200, status: 'Available', address: 'Verbier, Switzerland', daysOnMarket: 10 }, { id: 4, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1502672260266-1c1ef2d93688', price: 'CHF 1,750,000', beds: 3, baths: 2, sqft: 2100, status: 'Available', address: 'Interlaken, Switzerland', daysOnMarket: 8 }, { id: 5, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1522708323590-d24dbb6b0267', price: 'CHF 3,100,000', beds: 6, baths: 5, sqft: 3900, status: 'Available', address: 'Gstaad, Switzerland', daysOnMarket: 3 } ]; return (

Discover the Finest Swiss Chalets

We've handpicked the most beautiful and luxurious chalets across Switzerland, ready for you to explore.

{properties.map(property => (
{property.status}
{property.daysOnMarket} days listed
{property.price}
{property.address}
{property.beds} bedrooms {property.baths} baths {property.sqft.toLocaleString()} sqft
))}
); }; export default PropertyListings;
